list.abs: ...电子游戏重制（video game remake）是将早期电子游戏作品密切改编的行为，现代化通常目的是让游戏适应新硬件和新受众。通常情况下，重制游戏基本使用和原来作品相同的标题、基本的游戏理念和相同的核心故事元素。重制版通常很少是用原版的资源和游戏源代码，这和“强化移植版”（enhanced port）、“部分重制版”与“复.

entry.tran: 重新摄制的作品；翻拍的电影
entry.def: A remake is a film that has the same story, and often the same title, as a film that was made earlier.

example.tran: 1953年重拍的30年代音乐剧《罗伯塔》

entry.def: If a film is remade, a new film is made that has the same story, and often the same title, as a film that was made earlier.

example.ex: Originally released in 1957, the film was remade as 'The Magnificent Seven'.
example.tran: 这部电影最早在1957年上映，后被翻拍为《七侠荡寇志》。

entry.tran: (尤指以更好的方式)重新做，改造，翻新
entry.def: If you have something remade, you ask someone to make it again, especially in a way that is better than before.

example.ex: He had all the window frames in the room remade.
example.tran: 他把房间里所有的窗框都翻新了。

means.word_mean: 1. creation that is created again or anew;
